$SesClient = new SesClient([
    'profile' => 'default',
    'version' => '2010-12-01',
    'region' => 'us-east-1'
]);

try {
    $result = $SesClient->getSendStatistics([
    ]);
    var_dump($result);
} catch (AwsException $e) {
    // output error message if fails
    echo $e->getMessage();
    echo "\n";
}
